get_assignments.search_term desc: partial text of the assignment title, e.g., test

get_assignment_overrides.assignment_id desc: assignment id, e.g., 1234. Find the assignment id first using get_assignments

get_courses_in_account.search_term desc: partial text of course title, code, and id; or teacher's name

guide: Select an empty cell to start
Click the button to call API <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" id="btnCallAPI" onclick="google.script.run.get_accounts()">Call API</button>
Select a cell with an account id
Click the button to call API <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" id="btnCallAPI" onclick="google.script.run.get_sub_accounts()">Call API</button>
Select an empty cell to start

Click the button to generate the params template: <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" id="btnGenTemp" onclick="google.script.run.generateParamTemplate('get_courses_in_account')">Generate Template</button>
Select the range of the params names and values
Click the button to call API <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" id="btnCallAPI" onclick="google.script.run.get_courses_in_account()">Call API</button>

template.search_term desc: partial text of course title, code, and id; or teacher's name
